title: Fix duplicate text, slow down road transitions, add comprehensive audio, restore road scenes after breakpoint and issue

requirements.text: Remove duplicate sentences from the StartJourneyScreen component so each piece of information appears only once

quotes: in the first page there is duplication of sentences remove that and make it only one

acceptanceCriteria: No text content is repeated on the start journey screen
All essential information remains present and clear

requirements.text: Change the road image transition timing in AnimatedTravelFallback from the current interval to 20 seconds per image

quotes: Let the road images change a bit slowly make it to 20 sec for each road image change

acceptanceCriteria: Each road scene image displays for exactly 20 seconds before transitioning
Smooth crossfade transitions remain between images

requirements.text: Add audio/sound effects for all interactive elements and transitions throughout the entire journey experience where audio is currently missing
acceptanceCriteria: Audio plays at appropriate moments during the journey flow
Sound effects enhance user interactions without being overwhelming
All major transitions and screens have accompanying audio

requirements.text: After the break point arrival overlay is dismissed, show the road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before proceeding to the halt issue part

quotes: after the break point part again road has to be shown clicking anywhere the issue part

acceptanceCriteria: Road scene displays after break point overlay is closed
User can click anywhere on the road scene to advance
Flow correctly transitions from road scene to halt issue overlay

requirements.text: After the halt issue quiz overlay is resolved, show the road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before reaching the final campfire destination

quotes: again road has to be shown clicking anywhere reaching destination campfire

acceptanceCriteria: Road scene displays after issue overlay is dismissed
User can click anywhere on the road scene to continue
Flow correctly transitions from road scene to campfire destination screen

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Preserve existing sound effects (traveling, break-point-reached, campfire-arrival, thud, alert, issue)
Maintain the single break stop flow architecture
nonGoals: Changing the number of break stops
Modifying the halt issue quiz content or logic
Altering the campfire celebration screen design
